00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <unistd.h>
00022 #include <getopt.h>
00023 #include <malloc.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 
00026 #include <glib.h>
00027 
00028 #include "libuau.h"
00029 #include "database.h"
00030 #include "util.h"
00031 
00032 #ifdef WITH_DMALLOC
00033 #  include <dmalloc.h>
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 
00037 static void printUsage(void);
00038 static struct option* getLongOptions();
00039 
00040 int
00041 main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00042         AProgInfo info;
00043         GPtrArray *keywords = NULL;
00044         struct option *longOptions = getLongOptions();
00045         gboolean remove = FALSE, result;
00046         char *url = NULL, *version = NULL, *shortname = NULL, *fullname = NULL, *desc = NULL, *program;
00047         ADate *date = NULL;
00048         AInterface interface = {-1, -1};
00049         int c, ret = 0;
00050         
00051         if (argc == 1) {
00052                 printUsage();
00053                 g_free(longOptions);
00054                 exit(0);
00055         }
00056         
00057         while ((c = getopt_long(argc, argv, ":u:d:k:v:i:s:n:f:hr", longOptions, NULL)) != -1) {
00058                 switch (c) {
00059                         case 'u':
00060                                 url = g_strdup(optarg);
00061                                 break;
00062                         case 'd':
00063                                 date = g_malloc(sizeof(ADate));
00064                                 luau_parseDate(date, optarg);
00065                                 break;
00066                         case 'k':
00067                                 keywords = lutil_gsplit(",", optarg);
00068                                 break;
00069                         case 'i':
00070                                 luau_parseInterface(&interface, optarg);
00071                                 break;
00072                         case 'v':
00073                                 version = g_strdup(optarg);
00074                                 break;
00075                         case 'n':
00076                                 shortname = g_strdup(optarg);
00077                                 break;
00078                         case 'f':
00079                                 fullname = g_strdup(optarg);
00080                                 break;
00081                         case 's':
00082                                 desc = g_strdup(optarg);
00083                                 break;
00084                         case 'h':
00085                                 printUsage();
00086                                 g_free(longOptions);
00087                                 exit(0);
00088                         case '?':
00089                                 printf("Invalid option: -%c\n", optopt);
00090                                 printUsage();
00091                                 g_free(longOptions);
00092                                 exit(1);
00093                         case 'r':
00094                                 remove = TRUE;
00095                                 break;
00096                         case ':':
00097                                 printf("Argument needed for -%c\n", optopt);
00098                                 printUsage();
00099                                 g_free(longOptions);
00100                                 exit(1);
00101                         default:
00102                                 printf("Unknown error: got character code 0%o\n", c);
00103                                 printUsage();
00104                                 g_free(longOptions);
00105                                 exit(1);
00106                 }
00107         }
00108         
00109         if (keywords == NULL)
00110                 keywords = g_ptr_array_new(); /* empty list of keywords */
00111         
00112         g_free(longOptions);
00113         
00114         if (argc == optind+1) {
00115                 program = argv[optind];
00116                 
00117                 if (remove) {
00118                         result = luau_getProgInfo(&info, program);
00119                         if (result == TRUE)
00120                                 luau_deleteApp(&info);
00121                         else {
00122                                 fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: specified program not found\n");
00123                                 ret = 1;
00124                         }
00125                         luau_freeProgInfo(&info);
00126                 } else {
00127                         memset(&info, 0, sizeof(AProgInfo));
00128                         
00129                         info.id = program;
00130                         info.fullname = fullname;
00131                         info.shortname = shortname;
00132                         info.desc = desc;
00133                         info.version = version;
00134                         info.date = date;
00135                         info.url = url;
00136                         info.keywords = keywords;
00137                         luau_copyInterface(&(info.interface), &interface);
00138                         
00139                         printf("Registering %s ... \n", program);
00140                         luau_registerNewApp(&info);
00141                         luau_db_create("updates_hidden", program);
00142                         printf("Done.\n");
00143                 }
00144         } else {
00145                 if (argc == optind)
00146                         printf("ERROR: No program name specified\n");
00147                 else /* argc > optind + 1 */
00148                         printf("ERROR: Too many arguments\n");
00149                 
00150                 printUsage();
00151                 ret = 1;
00152         }
00153         
00154         for (c = 0; c < keywords->len; ++c) 
00155                 g_free(g_ptr_array_index(keywords, c));
00156         g_ptr_array_free(keywords, TRUE);
00157         
00158         g_free(url);
00159         g_free(date);
00160         g_free(version);
00161         g_free(shortname);
00162         g_free(fullname);
00163         g_free(desc);
00164         
00165         return ret;
00166 }
00167 
00168 static void
00169 printUsage(void) {
00170         printf("Usage: luau_register [OPTION] ... program_id\n");
00171         printf("\n");
00172         printf("Register a program with the specified details in the Luau database.\n");
00173         printf("\n");
00174         printf("Options:\n");
00175         printf("  -r, --remove                     remove specified program from the database\n\n");
00176         printf("  -u, --url=LOCATION               location of Luau software repository file\n");
00177         printf("  -d, --date=\"MM/DD/YYYY\"          release date of this program version\n");
00178         printf("  -k, --keywords=\"KEY1,KEY2,...\"   keywords for this program revision\n");
00179         printf("  -v, --version=VERSION            installed version of this program\n");
00180         printf("  -i, --interface=VERSION          interface version for this program\n");
00181         printf("  -n, --shortname=NAME             short \"UNIX name\" of program\n");
00182         printf("  -f, --fullname=NAME              full/display name of program\n");
00183         printf("  -s, --desc=DESC                  one-line description of program\n");
00184         printf("  -h, --help                       display this help message\n");
00185         printf("\n");
00186         lutil_printIndented(2, 80, "Note that both the server and the software repository URL must be set for Luau to work for any given program.  If no short name is specified, the program_id is used.  Please see the Luau whitepaper for more information.");
00187         printf("\n");
00188 }
00189 
00190 static struct option *
00191 getLongOptions() {
00192         struct option *options = (struct option *) calloc(11, sizeof(struct option));
00193         
00194         options[5].name = "remove";
00195         options[5].has_arg = 0;
00196         options[5].flag = NULL;
00197         options[5].val = 'r';
00198         
00199         options[0].name = "url";
00200         options[0].has_arg = 1;
00201         options[0].flag = NULL;
00202         options[0].val = 'u';
00203         
00204         options[2].name = "date";
00205         options[2].has_arg = 1;
00206         options[2].flag = NULL;
00207         options[2].val = 'd';
00208         
00209         options[4].name = "keywords";
00210         options[4].has_arg = 1;
00211         options[4].flag = NULL;
00212         options[4].val = 'k';
00213         
00214         options[1].name = "version";
00215         options[1].has_arg = 1;
00216         options[1].flag = NULL;
00217         options[1].val = 'v';
00218         
00219         options[8].name = "interface";
00220         options[8].has_arg = 1;
00221         options[8].flag = NULL;
00222         options[8].val = 'i';
00223         
00224         options[9].name = "shortnam";
00225         options[9].has_arg = 1;
00226         options[9].flag = NULL;
00227         options[9].val = 'n';
00228         
00229         options[6].name = "fullname";
00230         options[6].has_arg = 1;
00231         options[6].flag = NULL;
00232         options[6].val = 'f';
00233         
00234         options[7].name = "desc";
00235         options[7].has_arg = 1;
00236         options[7].flag = NULL;
00237         options[7].val = 's';
00238         
00239         options[3].name = "help";
00240         options[3].has_arg = 0;
00241         options[3].flag = NULL;
00242         options[3].val = 'h';
00243         
00244         return options;
00245 }
